charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] noticed
Gloria and Cinderace acting a
bit strange.
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1101_0200_2:
As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] went up to them, Gloria noticed
[Name:PlayerNickname ] as well.
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_0300_1:
Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Seems you’re doing well today!
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_0401_0500_1:
Hehe! We were practicing our
signature pose!
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_0402_0700_1:
Uh-huh! Cinderace and I were trying to
come up with a signature pose!
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_0800_1:
You know how Leon has his Charizard
pose he always does?
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_0900_1:
I want us to have a pose too, to express
ourselves!
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_1000_1:
So I was trying to see what I could do
with Cinderace!
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_1100_1:
I think Cinderace wants people to see
more of his shining, Terastallized
self, too!
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_1200_1:
I wonder if he also wants to be like Hop,
the one who gave me his Egg, and
become part of a legend.
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_0301_1300_1:
Maybe Cinderace is more like you,
Gloria!
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_0402_1600_1:
Really? Does that mean Cinderace takes
after me?
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_1700_1: Well, come to think of it...
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_1800_1:
Lately, I’ve also become more conscious
of how people see me.
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_1900_1:
So maybe I’m becoming more like
Cinderace, too.
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_2000_1:
Ehehe! That makes me kinda happy!
I feel even closer to Cinderace now!
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_2100_1:
It just goes to show how long we’ve
been together!
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_2200_1:
I hope Cinderace and I continue to
experience and challenge all kinds of
things together.
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_2300_1:
I want us to shine on a grand stage like
never before!
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_2400_1:
All right! We’ll come up with the
brightest signature pose for that
very moment!
charaepi_ch0243_41_yuri/2301_1201_2500_1:
Will you help us think of one,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
